quest.name: Let There Be Lard
journal:
The night is dark and full of terrors, and Eshana wants for light.

objectives: Use gazelle meat to lure out fattened sarcosuchus at the Velodyna River and slay them for their lard.
Deliver the sarcosuchus lard to Eshana.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text:
You are the light that guidesss us, comrade. As such, I would have you prepare the lampsss we use for night patrol.
...Was that funny? I tried to jessst as you striders do.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: But jests aside, I need you to hunt sarcosuchus and harvessst their lard. Two pails' worth should sssuffice.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Here, take these cuts of gazelle meat and lay them along the Velodyna River. The sssmell should lure out the greediest, fattest creatures.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Ah, our guiding light returnsss. Tell me, were you able to obtain the sarcosuchus lard?

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Excellent. With this much lard, we shall have sssufficient light for a good many patrolsss. The refined oil burns long and ssstrong, and we Ananta have used it for our torches and bonfires since ancient timesss.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: And that is not all of its applicationsss. The refining process leaves behind a by-product that makes a nourishing sssalve. There is no better cure for dry skin and scales.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text:
So you sssee, not only are you the light that guidesss; you are also the sssalve that beautifiesss.
...How was that? Are my jests improving?
